remarks: Value of a function given by an ordered-pair class abstraction.  This version of ~ fvmptg uses bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
statement:
fvmptf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
fvmptf.2 $e |- F/_ x C $.
fvmptf.3 $e |- ( x = A -> B = C ) $.
fvmptf.4 $e |- F = ( x e. D |-> B ) $.
fvmptf $p |- ( ( A e. D /\ C e. V ) -> ( F ` A ) = C ) $.
$d D x $.
